attributes.action: To defend the out vote from the eu, to cancel "remainers"  petition
attributes.additional_details: The vote won in the eu referendum, I they will mixed feelings by both sides, in & out, but to change the vote of over a million people in the UK would seriously undermine the democracy and the oaths place upon Her Majesty the Queen at the time of her coronation.
attributes.background: We, the voice of the Brexit, have Won the vote fairly and democratically and any petition to undermine that vote would be fundamentally wrong and would unstable the democracy of great Britain and the oaths place upon Her Majesty the Queen at the time of her coronation
